allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add 3-tier pricing, 360 viewer, and Payload CMS blog

- Add new pricing-tiers component with Essential, Professional, and Premium tiers
- Create lightweight 360¬∞ panorama viewer with pinch/scroll zoom support
- Integrate 360 viewer into Transformation section with tabbed interface
- Set up Payload CMS 3.0 with PostgreSQL adapter
- Create blog collections \(Posts, Categories, Authors, Media, Users\)
- Add blog components \(BlogCard, BlogList, RichText, etc.\)
- Create /blog listing and /blog/[slug] pages with SEO metadata
- Update navbar and footer with Blog links

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Fix Vercel build errors

- Remove invalid favicon/ogImage from Payload meta config
